jd: Hello Professionals ..,I am looking to hire # Salesforce Business Analyst #position. Please find the below Job Description and share me the Profiles if your consultants are interested.Client:PWCImplementation:InfosysJob Title:Salesforce Business AnalystWork Location:Florida location(Locals Only)Duraton:6+ MonthsDetailed Job Description:Lead and manage the migration of legacy CRM solutions to Salesforce, ensuring minimal disruption to business operations.Gather and analyze business requirements to define objectives and deliverables for the CRM migrationDevelop and document detailed project plans,including timelines, milestones, risk assessments, and resource allocation.Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including IT, Sales, Marketing, and Customer Service, to ensure alignment and successful project execution.Design and implement Salesforce solutions to meet business requirements, including configuration, customization, and integration with other enterprise systems.Conduct thorough data mapping and migration activities, ensuring data accuracy and integrity throughout the process.Provide ongoing support and training for end-users to ensure successful adoption and utilization of the new Salesforce system.Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to the CRM migration and Salesforce platform.Stay up-to-date with the latest Salesforce features, best practices, and industry trends to continuously improve our CRM solutions.
